Title: La scheda bianca
Writer: Roberto Saviano (idea), Roberto Saviano (novel), Giovanni Bianconi (developer), Stefano Bises (developer), Leonardo Fasoli (developer), Ludovica Rampoldi (developer), Roberto Saviano (developer), Stefano Bises (story editor), Stefano Bises (story), Filippo Gravino (teleplay)
Actors: Marco D'Amore, Fortunato Cerlino, Maria Pia Calzone, Salvatore Esposito
Plot: Ciro looks on as Genny seizes a political opportunity that will enable the clan to manage their business affairs undisturbed.
